layout.title: Women AdvaNCe
layout.description: Women AdvaNCe is a community of storytellers. We follow the needs of underserved populations and uplift the discussions that matter to the women in our state. Women in our state, especially disabled women, LGBTQ+ women, and BIPOC women, are too often silenced or discouraged from raising concerns about justice and equity
layout.creator: Jesus Chavez

hero.title: Building Brands, One Pixel at a Time
hero.subtitle: we're dedicated to shaping digital landscapes with awe-inspiring web design and development. Our mission is to bring your brand's story to life through visually captivating and functionally flawless websites.

about.heading: WHO WE ARE
about.title: Crafting Digital Experiences that Captivate and Convert
about.paragraph: We specialize in crafting captivating digital experiences that seamlessly blend creativity and technology. Our expert team is dedicated to designing visually stunning and user-centric websites that not only engage but also convert, ensuring your brand's success in the digital realm. Whether it's an e-commerce platform, corporate site, or interactive web app, we're committed to bringing your vision to life with captivating results.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.title: Happy Customer Feedback About Our Service

first.name: Julio Zaconet
first.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions turned our vision into reality with an exceptional website that exceeded our expectations. Their team's creativity and technical prowess are evident in every detail of the design, making navigation intuitive and user engagement seamless. We couldn't be happier with the stunning aesthetics and functionality they brought to our online presence

second.name: Nicki Faircloth
second.paragraph: Working with Queen City Web Solutions was an absolute delight. They took our ideas and transformed them into a visually striking and highly functional website. The design perfectly captures the essence of our brand, and the user experience is top-notch. Their dedication to excellence truly shines through, and we're proud to showcase our new website to our clients and partners

third.name: Jesus Chavez
third.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions is a game-changer! They crafted a website that not only reflects our company's ethos but also ensures our visitors stay engaged and convert. The attention to detail is remarkable, from the seamless responsiveness across devices to the innovative features that set us apart. The team's expertise and commitment to delivering a remarkable online experience are unparalleled. We're incredibly impressed with the final result

contact.title: Help Us Make Change
contact.paragraph: We encourage all of those who are part of our church family to give—not out of obligation but out of a spirit of worship. Your gifts allow God's work to be done in our midst, in our community, and in the world around us.

section1.heading: Be a Changemaker
section1.title: Support our Cause with a Single Click!
section1.paragraph: Support our initiative and make a difference by clicking on the donation button provided. Your generous contribution through this button will directly impact the lives of those in need. With just a few clicks, you can join our community of donors and help us create a positive change. Every dollar donated through this button brings us closer to achieving our goals and making a lasting impact on the lives of many.

email.heading: Other Ways to Give
email.title: Connect with Our Donation Coordinator for Contributions
email.paragraph: If you are interested in making a donation to support our cause, we encourage you to reach out to our dedicated Donation Coordinator. Our Donation Coordinator is ready to assist you with any questions you may have regarding the donation process, different giving options, and the impact your contribution can make. Whether you have specific preferences or require further information, our Donation Coordinator will ensure that your donation experience is smooth and tailored to your needs. Feel free to email our Donation Coordinator at [email protected] and take the first step in making a meaningful difference through your generous support.

overview.title: Women AdvaNCe
overview.paragraph: Queen City Web Solutions is a dynamic web services provider based in Charlotte, North Carolina. Our dedicated team specializes in delivering top-tier web design and development solutions, seamlessly merging creativity and technology to craft engaging online experiences. With a strong focus on cybersecurity, we ensure that your digital journey is not only visually captivating but also fortified against potential threats
